attributes.additional_details: Many women struggle to afford female hygiene products and the cost of living crisis also pushes the orice of these essential items up
attributes.background: To be able to make feminine hygiene products free for the people who struggle to afford the expensive of such things and the young girls out there. Women should not be having to pay for something that they have to go through monthly not because they caused it its a way of living

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710759
